name: ganza
description: Cross platform Video player built with React.js and Electron

scripts.build:app: webpack && mkdir -p dist/app/dist && cp -t ./dist/app/ index.html index.css package.json index.js && cp dist/bundle.js dist/app/dist/ && cp src/assets/logo.png dist/app/ && mkdir -p ./dist/app/node_modules/
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:app && electron-packager ./dist/app/ --overwrite --out=dist --electron-version=1.4.13 --platform=linux --arch=x64 --app-bundle-id=com.stevelacy.ganza --app-version=$npm_package_version && cp -r node_modules/ ./dist/ganza-linux-x64/resources/app/ && cd dist/ && tar -czvf ./ganza-linux-${npm_package_version}.tar.gz ganza-linux-x64/*

author: Steve Lacy <me@slacy.me> (http://slacy.me)
